title: Wood Elf
content:
ts. Decades of training in archery and camouflage are enhanced by an otherworldly swiftness.

Wood Elf Features in Baldur's Gate 3

Fleet of Foot: Move up to 10.5m per turn. Mask of the Wild: Proficiency in Stealth.

BG3 Elf Features

Darkvision: See in the dark up to 12m. Keen Senses: Proficiency in Perception. Fey Ancestry: Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed, and magic canâ€™t put them to sleep. Elven Weapon Training: Proficiency in Longsword, Shortsword, Longbow and Shortbow.

Woo
